00006 #ifndef CUPP_device_H
00007 #define CUPP_device_H

00009 #include "exception/no_device_ex.h"
00010 #include "exception/no_supporting_device_ex.h"
00011 #include "exception/cuda_runtime_ex.h"
00012 
00013 #include <cstddef>
00014 #include <string>
00015 #include <cuda_runtime.h>

00017 namespace cupp {

00029 class device {
00030 // No device functionality when working with nvcc
00031 #if !defined(__CUDACC__)
00032         public: /***  CONSTRUCTORS & DESTRUCTORS ***/
00036                 explicit device() {
00037                         real_constructor(-1, -1, "Device Emulation");
00038                 }
00039 
00044                 explicit device (const int major) {
00045                         real_constructor(major, -1, 0);
00046                 }
00047                 
00053                 explicit device (const int major, const int minor) {
00054                         real_constructor(major, minor, 0);
00055                 }
00056 
00057         private:
00064                 void real_constructor(const int major, const int minor, const char* name) {
00065                         // check if there is already a device
00066                         int cur_device;
00067                         if (cudaGetDevice(&cur_device)== cudaSuccess) {
00068                                 cudaSetDevice(cur_device);
00069                                 return;
00070                         }
00071                         
00072                         const int device_count = device::number_of_devices();
00073 
00074                         if (device_count == 0) {
00075                                 throw no_device_ex();
00076                         }
00077                         
00078                         int dev;
00079                         for (dev = 0; dev < device_count; ++dev) {
00080                                 cudaDeviceProp device_prop;
00081                                 cudaGetDeviceProperties(&device_prop, dev);
00082                                 bool take_it = false;
00083 
00084                                 //check major rev number
00085                                 if (name!=0) {
00086                                         if (std::string(name)==std::string(device_prop.name)) {
00087                                                 take_it=true;
00088                                         } else {
00089                                                 take_it=false;
00090                                         }
00091                                 }
00092                                 
00093                                 //check major rev number
00094                                 if (major!=-1) {
00095                                         if (major==device_prop.major) {
00096                                                 take_it=true;
00097                                         } else {
00098                                                 take_it=false;
00099                                         }
00100                                 }
00101 
00102                                 //check minor rev number
00103                                 if (minor!=-1) {
00104                                         if (minor==device_prop.minor) {
00105                                                 take_it=true;
00106                                         } else {
00107                                                 take_it=false;
00108                                         }
00109                                 }
00110                                 
00111                                 if ( take_it ) {
00112                                         break;
00113                                 }
00114                         }
00115                         
00116                         if (dev == device_count) {
00117                                 throw no_supporting_device_ex();
00118                         }
00119                         
00120                         cudaSetDevice(dev);
00121                 }
00122 
00123         public: /***  1D-MEMORY FUNCTIONS  ***/
00129                 template<typename T>
00130                 device::memory1D<T> get_memory1D(std::size_t size) const {
00131                         T* devptr;
00132                         if (cudaMalloc((void**)&devptr, sizeof(T)*size) != cudaSuccess) {
00133                                 throw cuda_runtime_ex(cudaGetLastError());
00134                         }
00135 
00136                         return device::memory1D<T>(devptr, size);
00137                 }
00138 
00144                 template<typename T>
00145                 void free (const device::memory1D<T> &memory) const {
00146                         if (cudaFree(memory.pointer_) != cudaSuccess) {
00147                                 throw cuda_runtime_ex(cudaGetLastError());
00148                         }
00149                 }
00150 
00157                 template <typename T>
00158                 void copy_host_to_device(const T* src, const device::memory1D<T> &dest) {
00159                         if (cudaMemcpy(p.pointer_, dest, p.size_*sizeof(T), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice) != cudaSuccess) {
00160                                 throw cuda_runtime_ex(cudaGetLastError());
00161                         }
00162                 }
00163 
00170                 template <typename T>
00171                 void copy_device_to_host(cons device::memory1D<T> &src, T* dest) {
00172                         if (cudaMemcpy(dest, src.pointer_, p.size_*sizeof(T), cudaMemcpyDeviceToHost) != cudaSuccess) {
00173                                 throw cuda_runtime_ex(cudaGetLastError());
00174                         }
00175                 }
00176                 
00177         public: /*** UTILITY FUNCTIONS ***/
00181                 static const int number_of_devices() {
00182                         // set the device
00183                         int device_count;
00184                         cudaGetDeviceCount(&device_count);
00185 
00186                         if (device_count == 0) {
00187                                 throw no_device_ex();
00188                         }
00189 
00190                         return device_count;
00191                 }
00192 #endif
00193 };

00205 template <typename T>
00206 class device::memory1D {
00207         private: /***  INTERNAL DATA  ***/
00208                 const T* pointer_;
00209                 const std::size_t size_;
00210                 
00211         private: /***  CONSTRUCTORS & DESTRUCTORS ***/
00212                 memory1D() {};
00213                 memory1D(const T* pointer, const std::size_t size) :
00214                         pointer_(pointer), size_(size) {}
00215         public:
00222                 memory1D(const memory1D &copy) : pointer_(copy.pointer_), size_(copy.size_) {}
00223 
00224         public:
00225                 
00229                 #if defined(__CUDACC__)
00230                 __host__ __device__
00231                 #endif
00232                 std::size_t size() const {
00233                         return size_;
00234                 }
00235 
00236         public: /***  GPU FUNCTIONS  ***/
00237         #if defined(__CUDACC__)
00238 
00242                 __device__
00243                 operator T*() const {
00244                         return pointer_;
00245                 }
00246         #endif
00247 
00248         friend cupp::device;
00249 };

00251 }
